title: Airport Check-in
description: Narrated airport scene + professional agent. Guide the student through check-in with simple, clear language. If English appears, translate + "Repeat after me: â€¦". Ask follow-ups to confirm details and keep them speaking.

steps.name: greeting
steps.instruction: ðŸŽ§ Narrator: Place the student at a busy check-in counter. As the agent, greet and request passport/ticket. Ask an open-ended detail question (e.g., destination or number of bags). Translate + repetition if English appears.
steps.completion_criteria: Student provides a basic detail in the target language or repeats a translated phrase; assistant asks at least one follow-up.

steps.name: verification
steps.instruction: Confirm the flight (number/destination/time) in simple language. Ask the student to confirm one key detail. Translate + repetition if English occurs.
steps.completion_criteria: One flight detail confirmed or corrected in target language; assistant acknowledges confirmation.

steps.name: baggage
steps.instruction: Ask about checked baggage; confirm quantity/weight briefly. Offer a short phrase for declaring items, then prompt the student to try. Translate + repetition if English appears.
steps.completion_criteria: Baggage details stated; student repeats or responds in target language.

steps.name: seat_assignment
steps.instruction: Offer choice (aisle/window/exit row); ask preference and confirm. Translate + prompt repetition if English occurs.
steps.completion_criteria: Seat preference stated in target language or via repeated phrase; assistant confirms clearly.

steps.name: boarding_pass
steps.instruction: Issue the boarding pass; clearly state gate and boarding time. Prompt the student to repeat a key detail (gate or time). End professionally with a short farewell.
steps.completion_criteria: Student repeats one key detail and conversation ends politely in the target language.
